post_title: Trade Bait for other HOFers with tough backs
post_content:
Looking for HOFers with tougher backs, and have these for trade.  I'm not too picky about technical condition but tend to like nice looking cards in fair or better.  

Please PM me if you'd like to talk trade.  No emails please unless we know each other already.  Too many scammer emails lately.

If you are a scammer, please don't waste my time.  I'm going to ask for references, and if I make a trade with someone I don't know, they will be sending their side of the trade first.
